title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-2.13 - General provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-2.13 - General provisions

State Regulations

Provisions and standards applicable to the construction and location of all water wells, and the installation of all pumps and pumping equipment contained in Appendix 5-B, Standards for Water Wells of this Title shall be used as the basis for issuing or denying a permit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
5-2.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
